author: Amazon Customer

review: Very disappointed. The first stick we ordered did not connect to Amazon.com. Technical support tried to help, but after about 90 minutes on the phone, they determined there was "a problem with the software" and sent a replacement stick. Same problem, no solution. Third stick did not even get past the Amazon startup screen, and the customer service rep bordered on rude his "support." Fourth stick had the same problem as sticks #1 and #2. Returned all four and ordered a Roku stick. Initially, that did not connect either, but a simple text chat with tech support resolved it in less than 20 minutes by taking me to a "secret screen" where Roku has built in access to updates. Once the system update kicked in, the streaming booted up and ran perfectly. More useful, intuitive remote with responsive buttons.$10 difference in price, world of difference in results.
